adrFormatAddress: 888 Main St, New York, NY 10044, USA

originalText.text: My family and I made a great decision to move to New York four months ago and settle in The Octagon on Roosevelt Island. The peaceful environment is exactly what we were looking for, and we have been extremely satisfied with the building management, the exceptional service by the staff, and the range of top-notch facilities available to us. The prompt response to any apartment issues and the ease of the computerized systems in place makes living here even more convenient. We highly recommend The Octagon as an excellent place to live. Thank you for providing us with such a wonderful experience.

originalText.text: Moving to The Octagon on Roosevelt Island has been a delightful experience for us. The serene surroundings and the modern, well-maintained amenities have exceeded our expectations. The staff here are both professional and warm, always ready to assist with any need or query. The apartment's features are top-tier, and the community's attention to detail is evident in every corner. The swift and efficient handling of maintenance requests is particularly commendable. We feel genuinely at home here and would wholeheartedly endorse The Octagon to anyone seeking a harmonious and upscale living space in New York. Our heartfelt gratitude goes out to everyone who contributes to making The Octagon a remarkable place to live.

originalText.text:
I’ve lived here almost half a year and I am pretty sure we made a great decision to live in the Octagon and in this Roosevelt Island. I hear amenity is the best in this Island from other friends and they often say they envy me living in the Octagon.
I take yoga classes provided by the Guided Fitness and it’s super nice for refresh and also free for residents:) My kids also enjoy the life in the Octagon. Because it’s north in the island, less car, quiet and clean(this is the best part for my kids, completely different from Manhattan!) The view is breathtaking.
Management and concierge are very friendly and nice. This is the real hidden gem:)

originalText.text: Living in The Octagon on Roosevelt Island is an absolute joy! The meticulously crafted interior design creates a sense of opulence, complemented by outstanding amenities. Mary, a member of the building management team, adds an extra layer of warmth with her wonderful and helpful nature. The views are simply unbeatable – this place deserves every one of its five stars!

originalText.text: The Octagon is simply a wonderful place to live. Moved here 5 months ago and building management and staff are just exceptional. Such prompt responses to any inquiries and issues that may arise. I’ve always felt so welcome and safe here.
